citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
An adult female AussieDoodle named Charlie (m/c# 900113001982890) had excessively matted hair on her back, rump,
sides, and legs. Matted hair can result in skin problems, can be painful, and can compromise the hair’s ability to provide
protection from the heat or cold. The licensee must remove the matted hair from the animal and must establish an
effective program of haircoat maintenance.

Five food receptacles, being used by a total of nine adult dogs and seven puppies, had dirt and grime around the rim and
extending partway into the inside of the receptacles. Dirt and grime can harbor organisms that can contaminate the food
and that can cause disease in dogs. The licensee must ensure that food receptacles are kept clean and sanitized. TO BE
CORRECTED BY FEBRUARY 08, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2)  Repeat
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
An adult female AussieDoodle named Charlie (m/c# 900113001982890) had excessively matted hair on her back, rump, 
sides, and legs. Matted hair can result in skin problems, can be painful, and can compromise the hair’s ability to provide 
protection from the heat or cold. The licensee must remove the matted hair from the animal and must establish an 
effective program of haircoat maintenance. 
3.9(b) 
   
Feeding 
Five food receptacles, being used by a total of nine adult dogs and seven puppies, had dirt and grime around the rim and 
extending partway into the inside of the receptacles. Dirt and grime can harbor organisms that can contaminate the food 
and that can cause disease in dogs. The licensee must ensure that food receptacles are kept clean and sanitized. TO BE 
CORRECTED BY FEBRUARY 08, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
